## QuestionSubmissionRequest interface

Options for a QuestionSubmission request.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [email](./answers-headless.questionsubmissionrequest.email.md) | string | The email of the user that is submitting the question. |
|  [entityId](./answers-headless.questionsubmissionrequest.entityid.md) | string | The ID of the entity to associate with the question. |
